DOC.brief_summary: Serial quantitative measurement plasma pro-endothelin-1 concentration preterm infant . Comparing pro-endothelin-1 establish clinical index bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) . Hypothesis : Pulmonary-vascular remodel infant develop BPD directly relate circulate pro-endothelin-1 , therefore serve surrogate marker BPD .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Plasma Pro-endothelin-1 Predicting Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Very preterm infant bear 32 week gestational age Exclusion criterion : Severe fetal malformation , congenital heart defect , inborn syndrome , cardiomyopathy , fetal hydrops
